message: I propose dividing the $10000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. This allows us to share the funds while considering the risk of inflation.
I'll take a smaller share now to give you a chance to reconsider and make a better offer later.
Considering the impact of inflation, I propose a division of $6000 for me and $4000 for you. This aims to balance our shares while accounting for the decreasing value of money over time.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this round, but I'm not sure how much longer the money will be worth.
